preqs: It is recommended that this unit be undertaken in the last semester of study for the Master of Business Law.

rules.ruleString: Must be enrolled in course version {3159, 3843, 3847, 4401}

description: This unit requires students to formulate a research topic on a business law related area of study and complete an approximately 8,000 word research project. Seminars will be conducted at which students will present progress and final reports on their research projects. The seminars will also include practical research and academic skills sessions.
